attributes.action: Stop Benefit cheats going to prison at the cost of the tax payer and make them pay for it
attributes.additional_details: Benefit cheats should not go to prison at the cost of the tax payer, they have stolen from the public and now the public is expected to pay an average of £47,000 a year to stop them doing it again! they should have to pay back all benefits that are deemed as fraudulent and pay for their prison stay in the form of community service or out of their own pocket!
